content:
Commercial WebDAV Products

  • Several companies are supporting WebDAV in their upcoming products:

    • Microsoft
      • Internet Information Services 5 (IIS)
      • Internet Explorer 5 (Web Folders feature)
      • Office 2000
    • Novell
      • GroupWise Web Publisher
    • Xerox
      • DocuShare 2.0
    • Glyphica
      • PortalWare
